response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 to us, reflecting its unique features, durability, and the expertise poured into its creation. We believe it could significantly enhance your life or business in ways we can only imagine. Considering its unparalleled value, we kindly invite you to consider acquiring it at this exclusive price. Should you choose to proceed, we promise a seamless and personalized experience tailored to your needs. Thank you for considering our offer, and we look forward to the possibility of collaborating with you.", "product_price": 12000}
